title: How to Match Clothes With White Pants

steps.title: Go simple with solid-colored T-shirt and a pair of relaxed white pants.
steps.content: Go simple with solid-colored T-shirt and a pair of relaxed white pants. If you have white jeans, cargo pants, capris, or any other casual white pants, try wearing them with a plain T-shirt in any solid color, although you can wear printed or stripes tees as well. You can even wear a graphic tee if that's more your style. [2] X Research source https//theeverygirl.com/7-ways-to-style-white-jeans/ Wear a fitted black T-shirt for a chic, bold look, or opt for a pop of color if you'd prefer to stand out. Keep this look ultra-casual by pairing it with your favorite white sneakers, or toss on a pair of heels or dress shoes to look a little more put-together. [3] X Expert Source Susan Kim Professional Stylist Expert Interview. 4 May 2021. If the weather is a little cool, try wearing a long-sleeved T-shirt with your white pants!

steps.title: Wear a chambray shirt and white jeans for a denim-on-denim look.
steps.content: Wear a chambray shirt and white jeans for a denim-on-denim look. If you love the casual lived-in look of chambray but you're having trouble finding the right pants, try a pair of white jeans. You can wear your denim shirt tucked in or untucked, and you can dress the outfit up or down depending on your shoes and accessories. [4] X Research source For instance, if your style is feminine, you might wear your hair loose and wavy, and you might accessorize with a pair of copper-toned jeweled sandals, a pastel belt, and a pendant necklace. If you have a more masculine style, you might wear your shirt tucked in with a leather belt and a pair of camel-colored chukka boots.

steps.title: Cover up your swimsuit with white linen pants.
steps.content: Cover up your swimsuit with white linen pants . If you're wearing a one-piece or a bikini at the beach or pool, white linen pants are the perfect breezy way to cover up if you want to grab lunch or do a little shopping. Simply toss on a pair of sandals if your style is a little more daring, or add a lightweight button-up top if you'd prefer more coverage. [5] X Research source Keep in mind that if you're wearing a brightly-colored swimsuit, it may be visible under the pants. Even if you're not swimming, you can recreate this look by wearing white linen pants with a cropped halter top, oversized sunglasses, and straw wedges.

steps.title: Try a nautical look with a striped shirt and white pants.
steps.content: Try a nautical look with a striped shirt and white pants. If you really want to channel a sailor, try wearing a navy-and-white boatneck top in horizontal stripes with a pair of wide-legged white trousers. However, if you'd prefer a more subtle nod, you can opt for vertical stripes, choose different colors on top, or change up the cut of the top and pants. For instance, you could wear a light blue-button down with vertical white stripes, white skinny jeans, and white espadrilles for a look that's seashore-inspired without seeming too literal.

steps.title: Layer multiple white pieces for a cool monochrome outfit.
steps.content: Layer multiple white pieces for a cool monochrome outfit. [6] X Expert Source Susan Kim Professional Stylist Expert Interview. 4 May 2021. White pants are the perfect start for a chic all-white look. Play with different fabrics and textures to add visual interest to your outfit. [7] X Research source For instance, you could wear ripped white cargo pants with a white T-shirt, white denim jacket, and all-white high-top sneakers for a street-style inspired monochrome look. Consider adding a brightly-colored shoe for a fun pop of color.

steps.title: Toss on a leather or denim jacket to stay warm in cool weather.
steps.content: Toss on a leather or denim jacket to stay warm in cool weather. Although white pants can sometimes look a little dressy, leather and denim jackets are the perfect way to keep your outfit casual when the weather starts to turn a little cool. Layer your jacket over a graphic tee if you want to be super casual, or toss on a button-down for a dressy-casual look. [8] X Research source Wear a pair of canvas basketball shoes or low-heeled sneakers in white or a bright, cheerful color to make this outfit even more effortless.

steps.title: Wear a cozy, slim-fitting sweater with wide-legged white pants in winter.
steps.content: Wear a cozy, slim-fitting sweater with wide-legged white pants in winter. These days, there's no reason to stop wearing white after Labor Day. When it's really cold outside, slip into your favorite snug sweater and a pair of comfy wide-legged pants for a winter-white look you can wear almost anywhere. [9] X Research source Finish this look with a pair of ankle boots in your favorite color to stay warm and stylish. You can also wear an oversized sweater with skinny-leg white trousers, if you prefer. Just avoid wearing baggy pieces on the top and bottom.

steps.title: Pair a flowy top with white skinny jeans for a feminine summertime look.
steps.content: Pair a flowy top with white skinny jeans for a feminine summertime look. If you want a romantic outfit perfect for a summer lunch date, choose a flowy blouse, white skinny jeans, and tan-colored wedge heels or loafers. Keep your accessories simple, like a pretty tennis bracelet or a pendant on a thin chain. [10] X Research source Chiffon, jersey, seersucker, cotton, and linen are all perfect fabrics for staying cool on a hot day. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Wear a halter or tank with sleek white trousers for an elegant night out.
steps.content: Wear a halter or tank with sleek white trousers for an elegant night out. If you're looking for a feminine look that's perfect for a night on the town, try wearing a pair of white trousers with a dressy halter top. Then, you can add a long vest or a blazer to cover up in case you get cool. [12] X Research source For instance, you might wear a gold sequinned halter with a long white duster and strappy gold heels for a glam girl's night. You could also wear a black tank top, black blazer, and black heels with your white pants for a chic, bold look.

steps.title: Opt for a colorful top with your white pants for a daytime look.
steps.content: Opt for a colorful top with your white pants for a daytime look. If you're going to a weekend get-together where you need to dress up, like having brunch with friends, wear a brightly-colored blouse or button-down with a pair of straight-legged white pants. Try a pattern, such as polka dots or floral print, for even more style. [13] X Expert Source Veronica Tharmalingam Professional Stylist Expert Interview. 6 April 2021. Then, slip on a pair of neutral loafers or mules for an effortlessly cool outfit you can wear anywhere. [14] X Research source For example, you could wear a salmon-colored button-down over a white crew-neck tee with white trousers and a pair of dark brown boat shoes or loafers. Try an off-the-shoulder chambray top, white skinny jeans, and tan mules for an on-trend take on this look.

steps.title: Toss on a blazer with white trousers for an easy work look.
steps.content: Toss on a blazer with white trousers for an easy work look. If you have a pair of work-appropriate white pants, you can wear a light-colored button-down and a structured blazer to create an outfit that's put-together and professional. Complete the look with tasteful accessories and dress shoes. [15] X Research source Switch to a casual button-down, a lacy camisole, or a graphic tee if you're going for drinks after work.

steps.title: Wear a warm white top and white wool pants for a dressy winter outfit.
steps.content: Wear a warm white top and white wool pants for a dressy winter outfit. For a winter-white take on the monochrome look, start with a pair of cozy white wool pants, then add a white sweater or another weather-appropriate white top. Then, you can add a white scarf, shoes, and accessories for a look that will look as stylish as it is warm. To add a little contrast, accessorize with gold jewelry, or add pops of a bold color like red or yellow. [16] X Expert Source Julia Dobkine Color Analysis Expert, Certified Image Consultant, and Style Coach Expert Interview. 18 February 2025.

steps.title: Stick with white dress socks for a subtle look.
steps.content: Stick with white dress socks for a subtle look. If you're wearing shoes that require socks, it's typically a good idea to match your socks to your pants. Unless your outfit is extremely sporty, try to find a thin pair of white dress socks, as thick cotton gym socks can look too casual with dress pants. [17] X Research source For instance, if you're wearing white jeans with a white sweatshirt and white high-tops, a pair of white gym socks would probably look fine. If you're wearing white trousers with a navy suit coat and brown shoes, a white suit coat would look out of place. If you're wearing sandals or heels, you typically don't need to wear socks at all.

steps.title: Opt for bold socks if you want to add a pop of color.
steps.content: Opt for bold socks if you want to add a pop of color. If you're not afraid to make a statement, socks in a fun color or pattern will really stand out against the hem of your white pants. Try matching them to another color in your outfit, or use them to add a pop of color to an otherwise sedate look. [18] X Research source For instance, if you're wearing all black with your white pants, a pair of grey, black, and pink argyle socks will add a playful touch. If you're wearing a blue and red plaid shirt, you might wear socks that are the same color of blue or red in your shirt.

steps.title: Match your belt to the rest of your outfit.
steps.content: Match your belt to the rest of your outfit. When you're choosing a belt, you can go with all-white to match your pants, or you can choose a color that reflects the rest of your outfit. Typically, it's a good idea to wear a belt that complements the color of your shoes, purse, or other accessories. However, if you prefer, you can choose a belt in a bright color to add a new color to your look. [19] X Research source For instance, if you're wearing brown shoes, you may want to wear a brown belt. On the other hand, you might wear a yellow belt, which will complement your shoes while adding an unexpected pop to your outfit. Of course, you don't have to wear a belt at all if you don't want to.

steps.title: Wear nude underwear so they won't show under your pants.
steps.content: Wear nude underwear so they won't show under your pants. Try to find underwear that is as close to your natural skin color as possible. White underwear can create a very visible contrast against your skin. It's also a good idea to look for high-cut, thong, or seamless styles to avoid visible underwear lines. If you're having trouble finding underwear that's similar to your skin color, try dyeing a pair yourself with coffee, tea, or commercial dye.
